reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Finnpartnership: Developing the Smart Community Concept: Supporting of community development and youth employment

description.narrative: The Helsinki Deaconess Institute carries out the project ?Developing the Smart Community Concept: Supporting community development and youth employment? without the intention of gaining profits. The project is implemented together with the Evangelical Luth eran Church in Namibia (ELCIN) in Keetmanshoop in a new housing estate called Krönlein.Community development of Krönlein will be supported by using CABLE working method (Community Action Based Learning for Empowerment) which Helsinki Deaconess Institute and ELCIN have been using successfully in Namibia for years. CABLE training aims to create action and change within the community: participants will find their own resources their places in the society and they will start acting as full citizens.In additio n to CABLE method VAMOS methodology will be used to promote youth employment. VAMOS created by the Helsinki Deaconess Institute combines outreach youth work social work and services that prepare the youth for education and employment. The project will impr ove the employability of the youth and strengthen their skills through non- and informal learning. The overall goal is to employ the youth within the construction work done by the Consortium. The direct beneficiaries of the project are Namibian vulnerable youth 15 to 35 years of age. In accordance with the Finnish development policy they are in a vulnerable position and easily marginalized. They suffer from youth unemployment and passivity and are at the risk of falling victims of crime violence poverty alc oholism prostitution and abuse.The communities expect the youth to be active and productive even though it is clear that the Namibian economy cannot offer them enough possibilities for employment. The youth feel in able to meet the demands set out for them . The stigma casts the youth outside social political and financial activities.As an outcome of the project the opportunities for employment have increased for the youth of Krönlein. The community of Krönlein has been strengthened and empowered due to th e construction project. The long term development goal is to meet the challenges of youth unemployment and passivity.
